definitions.definition: Any of many species of reef - dwelling fishes , most of them brightly coloured, of the family Acanthuridae . They bear erectile , scalpel -like, dangerously sharp spines on either side of the caudal peduncle .

main_definition: Any of many species of reef - dwelling fishes , most of them brightly coloured, of the family Acanthuridae . They bear erectile , scalpel -like, dangerously sharp spines on either side of the caudal peduncle .
